Ines Abejon

“I always enjoyed giving advice to colleges and family on style, new shops or wardrobe organization. So I decided to turn my passion into a profession!”

Wow!

The Image Company

WOW! was founded in Europe in 2008 and has carried out projects in big European cities such as Madrid, Vienna or Paris. Between 2011 and 2015 WOW! offered its services in Buenos Aires, Argentina. WOW! arrives in Manila, The Philippines in 2016.

Ines Abejon, the director, with many years of experience in the corporate world, knows just too well how confusing the dress codes and consequences of a negative image can be on your career. She has a honed sense of style, a passion for smart shopping and really enjoys helping others. Working with her is a unique, fun and fulfilling experience. Ines will help you increase your confidence and reach your goals on a personal and a professional basis!

In addition to numerous conferences and seminars in companies and associations such as the prestigious jewelry firm Frey Wille or the Professional Secretary Association of Madrid Ines has given classes in the summer courses of the Polytechnic University of Madrid and the Fashion Design University of Madrid.

Dozens of individuals and companies such as the online shopping portal eBay or the Austrian Patent Office are some of the many and diverse WOW! customers.

A native of Madrid, Ines has an international education from Spain, the USA and Austria and is fluent in three languages, all invaluable assets when working with her international clients.

Inés holds a Masters degree in economics from the Autonoma University, has certification as an Image Consultant from the London Image Institute and as a Color Consultant, Personal shopper and Fashion Stylist from the Sterling Style Academy of New York; which are both world renowned schools for image consulting.
